fields.name: Marin Nicasio+ 650B Bike 2022
fields.description: Marin created the Nicasio+ to be a bike that could take you beyond the road. It’s an endurance bike that will take you down any path you’d like, whether it’s on asphalt or a dirt path around a lake. The Series-1 CrMo frame ups the game with lighter, snappier tubing and premium features like a tapered head tube for the CrMo fork to reside in. There’s plenty of style thrown in as well.
